name: tvOS 14.4
available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause a denial of service
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Cees Elzinga

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A local user may be able to read arbitrary files
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved permissions logic.

cves.credit: Thomas Tempelmann

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A malicious application could execute arbitrary code leading to compromise of user information
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: @S0rryMybad of 360 Vulcan Team

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: JunDong Xie of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted font file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Ivan Fratric of Google Project Zero

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Hou JingYi (@hjy79425575) of Qihoo 360 CERT

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted text file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A stack overflow was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Mickey Jin (@patch1t) of Trend Micro working with Trend Micro’s Zero Day Initiative

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Mickey Jin & Junzhi Lu of Trend Micro working with Trend Micro’s Zero Day Initiative

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A local user may be able to create or modify system files
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Csaba Fitzl (@theevilbit) of Offensive Security

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to elevate their privileges
advisories.description: Multiple issues were addressed with improved logic.

cves.credit: James Hutchins

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to disclose kernel memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read issue existed that led to the disclosure of kernel memory. This was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Junzhi Lu(@pwn0rz), Qi Sun and Mickey Jin of Trend Micro working with Trend Micro’s Zero Day Initiative

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Peter Nguyen of STAR Labs

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Xingwei Lin of Ant-Financial Light-Year Security Lab

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to a denial of service
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Danny Rosseau of Carve Systems

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to a denial of service
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read issue existed in the curl. This issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Xingwei Lin of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An access issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to elevate their privileges
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Proteas and Pan ZhenPeng (@Peterpan0927) of Alibaba Security

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted URL may lead to arbitrary javascript code execution
advisories.description: A validation issue was addressed with improved input sanitization.

cves.credit: CodeColorist working with Ant Security Light-Year Labs

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause a denial of service
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

cves.credit: @m00nbsd

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: Multiple issues were addressed with improved logic.

cves.credit: @0xalsr

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to elevate privileges. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited.
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with improved locking.

cves.credit: an anonymous researcher

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A malicious attacker with arbitrary read and write capability may be able to bypass Pointer Authentication
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved validation.

cves.credit: CodeColorist of Ant-Financial Light-Year Labs

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

cves.credit: Francisco Alonso (@revskills)

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved state handling.

cves.credit: @S0rryMybad of 360 Vulcan Team

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Maliciously crafted web content may violate iframe sandboxing policy
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved iframe sandbox enforcement.

cves.credit: Eliya Stein of Confiant

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A malicious website may be able to access restricted ports on arbitrary servers
advisories.description: A port redirection issue was addressed with additional port validation.

cves.credit: Gregory Vishnepolsky & Ben Seri of Armis Security, and Samy Kamkar
